subsection.name: Forward
subsection.p: If the date is a non-working day, move forward to the next working day.

subsection.name: Modified Following
subsection.p: If the date is a non-working day, move forward to the next working day, UNLESS it crosses over a new month, in which case we revert to find the last working day of the current month.

subsection.name: Backward
subsection.p: If the date is a non-working day, move backward to the previous working day.

subsection.name: Modified Preceding
subsection.p: If the date is a non-working day, move backward to the previous working day, UNLESS it crosses over a new month, in which case we revert to find the next working day of the current month.
